title: Bistro Le Ste-Cath
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available.  A restaurant/art gallery/performance venue. Proceeds from the music shows go to a local organization/cafe (Cafe Graffiti) that helps out young artists. One page on the menu is for vegetarian dishes and includes two labeled vegan choices and one labeled as vegan upon request. Gluten-free is available.
